settings.title: Settings
settings.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset your progress?

tutorialP.title: Boxing Punches Tutorial
tutorialP.intro1: First, let's go through the different types of punches in boxing.
tutorialP.stanceText: If you're right handed, left foot front right foot behind, left hand is your lead hand and right hand is your rear. Left handed is the other way.
tutorialP.jabText: Throw your left and twist your left foot. The goal is to punch with your whole body, not just your arm.
tutorialP.crossText: Throw your right hand straight, pivot your right foot and rotate your hips for power.
tutorialP.leftHookText: Swing your left arm in a horizontal arc, pivot your left foot and rotate your hips.
tutorialP.rightHookText: Swing your right arm in a horizontal arc, pivot your right foot and rotate your hips.
tutorialP.leftUppercutText: Bend your knees, drop your left hand, then drive it upward with your legs and hips.
tutorialP.rightUppercutText: Bend your knees, drop your right hand, then drive it upward with your legs and hips.
tutorialP.jabCrossText: Throw a jab with your lead hand, then immediately follow with a cross from your rear hand.
tutorialP.soundsText: Now let's listen to the different sounds in boxing.
tutorialP.tripleTapText: This is a triple tap, it announces that you have 10 seconds before ending a round or before starting a round.
tutorialP.tripleBellText: This is a triple bell, it announces the end of a round.
tutorialP.endText: You completed the tutorial. Practice and have fun!
